title: Mussel broth
description: Paul Ainsworth makes the most of his local fruits of the sea, Porthilly mussels, turning them into a South-East Asian inspired dish.
ingredients: 2 red chillies, seeds removed, cut into finely sliced rings
1 litre/1¾ pints fish stock, cooked until reduced to 500ml/18fl oz
½ x 200ml/7fl oz tin coconut milk
